effect.x_y: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. User charges for one turn before attacking.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. User charges for one turn before attacking.

short_effect.x_y: Requires a turn to charge before attacking. Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Requires a turn to charge before attacking. Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

flavor_text.x_y: On the second turn, the user hits the target with electrically charged ice. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: On the second turn, the user hits the target with electrically charged ice. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
